docs.usage:
import { Ref } from "@cloudcamp/aws-runtime";
const { Ref } = require("@cloudcamp/aws-runtime");
from cloudcamp.aws_runtime import Ref
using Cloudcamp.Aws.Runtime;
import cloudcamp.aws.runtime.Ref;
